body_html:
@jerryzh168 Thanks for your reply. I don't understand what do you mean by 'proto file'. Do you mean the information returned by command 'net.Proto()', or is there similar file like the prototxt file in caffe? If the former, the information I get is also ambiguous. This op don't have names(I copied part of it down here), so I still can't distinguish them. Any help would be appreciated.

op {
input: "gpu_2/comp_2_conv_2_w_grad"
input: "gpu_2/ONE"
input: "gpu_2/comp_2_conv_2_w"
input: "gpu_2/wd"
output: "gpu_2/comp_2_conv_2_w_grad"
name: ""
type: "WeightedSum"
device_option {
device_type: 1
cuda_gpu_id: 2
}
}
op {
input: "gpu_2/comp_2_spatbn_2_s_grad"
input: "gpu_2/ONE"
input: "gpu_2/comp_2_spatbn_2_s"
input: "gpu_2/wd"
output: "gpu_2/comp_2_spatbn_2_s_grad"
name: ""
type: "WeightedSum"
device_option {
device_type: 1
cuda_gpu_id: 2
}
}
op {
input: "gpu_2/comp_3_conv_1_middle_w_grad"
input: "gpu_2/ONE"
input: "gpu_2/comp_3_conv_1_middle_w"
input: "gpu_2/wd"
output: "gpu_2/comp_3_conv_1_middle_w_grad"
name: ""
type: "WeightedSum"
device_option {
device_type: 1
cuda_gpu_id: 2
}
}
